title: Famous Quotations on Typography
content:
Hi:

I am working on project involving Humanist Hand calligraphy and Old Style typography.  
I need a good quote or saying on typography, lettering or calligraphy for this project.  
Does anyone have suggestions?

PS: I know that Albrecht Durer and Leonardo Da Vinci had good sayings.  
I just can't remember them!!!!
author: btoddch

comments.content: Check [this typophile tread](http://web.archive.org/web/20150422210327/http:/typophile.com/node/13406), and Alessandro Segalini's [Quotes on Typography and Type Design](http://web.archive.org/web/20150422210327/http:/www.as8.it/quotes/T-quotes.html). :)
